item.title: Period.
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Period.

Adding any other marginalized identity to Blackness is another layer of oppression to fight. Black queer people living their truths is a beautiful resistance.

bostonglobe.com

Black queer lives are Black lives that matter, too - The Boston Globe

Adding any other marginalized identity to Blackness is another layer of oppression to fight. Black queer people living their truths is a beautiful resistance.Adding any other marginalized identity to Blackness is another layer of oppression to fight. Black queer people living their truths is a beautiful resistance.

item.title: Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The seventh...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The seventh and final principle of Kwanzaa is IMANI, which means FAITH. How do you show your community, your teachers, your family, and YOURSELF that you have faith in them?

item.title: “2020 highlighted the power of community. People provided...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“2020 highlighted the power of community. People provided mutual aid to those in need during the COVID-19 crisis when the local and federal governments failed to do so. The protests and demonstrations for racial justice led to substantial changes (e.g., SB-217, renaming Stapleton and Columbus Park, eliminating school resources officers from DPS, etc.) that myself, friends and comrades, and elders had been pushing for decades. Black women and femmes, many who are grassroots organizers, were instrumental in mitigating voter suppression and advocating for policy changes.

“In sum, this was a year where, in a time of distress, grief, and tragedy, we saw the power of collective action to create the changes we want to see in our community and re-imagine new or better systems.”

— Dr. Apryl Alexander

Bye.

denverite.com

What a turbulent 2020 has taught some of Denver's leaders, influencers and inspirers

Bye.Bye.
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The sixth principle of Kwanzaa is KUUMBA, which means CREATIVITY. How do you use your creative mind and talents to create a better world?

item.title: Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The fifth...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The fifth principle of Kwanzaa is NIA, which means PURPOSE. What is your purpose in the collective fight toward liberation?

item.title: “This new civil rights movement – these kids are bold, and I...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“This new civil rights movement – these kids are bold, and I have to be just as bold," Rigmaiden said. "You know, I’m 71 now and I’m going to fight to keep that little sign in my window.”

Helen Rigmaiden, you are our family forever. No amount of time or space could ever keep us from riding for you. ✊🏽

The Black Lives Matter sign she hung in her window two years ago is getting more attention than ever before. It's not the kind of attention she wanted.

9news.com

Woman fights to keep BLM sign in her window

The Black Lives Matter sign she hung in her window two years ago is getting more attention than ever before. It's not the kind of attention she wanted.The Black Lives Matter sign she hung in her window two years ago is getting more attention than ever before. It's not the kind of attention she wanted.

item.title: “This is not a new conversation we’re having. It’s one...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“This is not a new conversation we’re having. It’s one that keeps coming up,” said Ari Lipscomb, an organizer with BLM Denver. “We’ve consistently asked for accountability. We’ve consistently asked for transparency. We’ve consistently asked for shared power and for the actions of BLMGN to reflect the work that we do.”

The Black Lives Matter movement, founded in 2013, has changed the way the nation talks about race. But the organization itself may be disconnected from local chapters.

nbcnews.com

A movement, a slogan, a rallying cry: How Black Lives Matter changed America’s view on race

The Black Lives Matter movement, founded in 2013, has changed the way the nation talks about race. But the organization itself may be disconnected from local chapters.The Black Lives Matter movement, founded in 2013, has changed the way the nation talks about race. But the organization itself may be disconnected from local chapters.

Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The fourth principle of Kwanzaa is UJAMAA, which means COOPERATIVE ECONOMICS. Tag your favorite Black owned business in the comments! #supportBlackbusiness #supportLocalbusinesses

item.title: Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The third...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The third principle of Kwanzaa is UJIMA, which means COLLECTIVE WORK AND RESPONSIBILITY. How do you work with your community and family to reach goals and get work done?

item.title: “We need to acknowledge Karenga’s full story, but it...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“We need to acknowledge Karenga’s full story, but it shouldn’t tarnish the value and beauty of the holiday that promotes collective action for the collective good.”

Thank you for sharing this op-ed, Amy!

I discovered Kwanzaa while attending Pomona College.

latimes.com

Op-Ed: The dark side of Kwanzaa's founder can't extinguish the holiday's beacon

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
